data.text: I di madangaholu malama o di hiwa ngadau i di madagoaa Zedekiah nogo king i Judah, gei ogo Nebuchadnezzar, di king o Babylonia, ga haneia mo ana llongo dauwa huogodoo, ga heebagi gi Jerusalem.
I di hiwa laangi o di haa malama o di madangaholu maa dahi ngadau i di madagoaa Zedekiah nogo king, di abaaba o di waahale gu mooho.

Di madagoaa Jerusalem dela guu kumi, digau aamua Babylonia huogodoo ga lloomoi gaa noho i di ngudu di bontai dela e hagaingoo bolo di Bontai o Tungaalodo, malaa, aanei nia ingoo digaula: Nergal Sharezer, Samgar Nebo, Sarsechim, mo tangada e hagaingoo labelaa bolo Nergal Sharezer.

Di madagoaa di King Zedekiah mo dana llongo dauwa ga gidee nia mee ala guu hai, digaula gaa hula gaa llele gi daha mo di waahale i di boo. Digaula gaa llele i di ala dela e hana i lodo di hadagee o di king, gaa hana i di ala dela e duudagi i mehanga nia abaaba e lua, gaa hana gi di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Jordan.

Gei digau dauwa o Babylonia ga waluwalu digaula, gaa kumi Zedekiah i lodo di gowaa maalama hoohoo adu gi Jericho. Digaula gaa lahi a mee gi di King Nebuchadnezzar, dela e noho i di waahale o Riblah i tenua o Hamath, gei Nebuchadnezzar ga haganoho di hai dela e hai gi mee.
Gei mee ga daaligi nia dama daane Zedekiah gii mmade i di guongo go Riblah, i mua nia golomada o Zedekiah, gei gu daaligi labelaa digau aamua huogodoo o Judah.
Nomuli hua, gei mee gaa hai bolo nia golomada o Zedekiah la gi kaabee gi daha, ga lawalawa a mee gi nia daula baalanga e lahi gi Babylonia.
I di madagoaa deelaa, gei digau o Babylonia gaa dudu di hale di king, mo nia hale o nia daangada, gaa oho gi daha nia abaaba o Jerusalem
Nomuli, Nebuzaradan, tagi o di llongo dauwa, ga lawalawa digau huogodoo ala ne dubu i golo i di waahale deelaa, gaa lahi gi Babylonia, madalia digau huogodoo ala ne halahala mouli gi baahi o mee,
gaa dugu digau ala koia e hagaloale i Judah, nadau gowaa ai, gaa wanga gi digaula nia hadagee waini mo nadau gowaa hai hadagee.
Di King Nebuchadnezzar ga helekai gi Nebuzaradan, di tagi ana gau dauwa, gi helekai gi nia dagi o nia buini dauwa boloo,
“Hula, halahala ina Jeremiah, benabena ina a mee hagahumalia. Goe hudee hai gi mee dahi hai huaidu, gei gi heia dana mee dela e hiihai ginai.”
Malaa, gei Nebuzaradan, mo ana gau aamua ala go Nebushazban mo Nergal Sharezer, mo digau aamua o di king Babylonia,

ga laha mai au gi daha mo di abaaba o di hale di king, gei digaula gaa dugu a Gedaliah e benebene au. Gedaliah, tama daane Ahikam, gei Ahikam tama daane Shaphan, gei mee e madamada humalia i di au bolo gii noho au i di aumaalia, gaa dae loo gi dogu dau i dogu hale. Gei au gu mehede guu noho i di aumaalia i baahi o nia daangada.
I dogu madagoaa nogo noho galabudi i lodo di abaaba di hale di king, gei Dimaadua ga helekai mai,

bolo au gi helekai gi Ebed Melech, tangada o Ethiopia, “Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, go di God o Israel, gu helekai, ‘Au ga gaamai di haadanga balua gi hongo di waahale deenei, hagalee go di haadanga lamalia, gadoo be di mee dela guu lawa ai dagu helekai. Di madagoaa o nia mee aanei ma ga kila aga, gei goe ga i di gowaa deelaa bolo gi gidee goe.
Gei Au, go Dimaadua, ga madamada humalia laa i di goe, gei goe hagalee e wanga gi digau ala e madagu iei goe.
Au ga madamada humalia i di goe bolo gii noho goe humalia, gei goe hagalee daaligi, goe ga dagaloaha ge mouli, idimaa i do hagadagadagagee mai gi di Au. Au go Dimaadua ne helekai.’”
